function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disclosure of personal information of affected persons","Impact":"Privacy violation, potential for stigmatization and discrimination","Mitigation":"Use of unique user IDs instead of personal names, strict data privacy laws and regulations","Technologies":"Encryption, anonymization, pseudonymization","People":"Affected individuals, general public","Owner":"App developers, government, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Privacy and data security issues in contact tracing applications","Impact":"Risk of data leakage, security problems, and potential misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to data protection laws, encryption of sensitive data, regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, secure communication protocols","People":"App users, general public","Owner":"App developers, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Ethical considerations in technology development","Impact":"Risk of fundamental rights violation, lack of public trust in technology","Mitigation":"Integration of ethical considerations in technology programming, transparency in data use, adherence to privacy laws","Technologies":"Ethical AI, transparent data processing, privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"Government officials, technology developers","Owner":"Government, tech companies"}]}
